name: BIRFIA (RTEmit)
description:
BIRFIA is a local multi-payer fighting game for max 6 players, who will be divided into 2 teams and fight each other with punch, water guns, and other special weapons! Push your components off the cliff to stop them and use Block wisely to parry incoming attacks! Now contains two modes.

To Win In Cart Mode: 
1. Escort the payload filled with bombs to your opponent's home by making sure only your team is standing inside the circle.
2. Bring back candies to the basket that matches your team's color.

To Win In Barl Mode:
1. Gain more points for your team within the time limits.

It's cute. It's lawless. It's full of chaos and surprises. BIRFIA is great for parties, friends and families. Come battle and may the best birdies win!
